title: Animated FP Civilian Arms Pack
description: AAA quality FP Civilian Arms Pack: Rigged & animated w/3 skin tones, 5 gloves, 5 clothing types, 4K textures. 83 assets total!
longDescription:
FP Civilian Arms Video Demo: youtu.be/nhPo2-NaUs4

FP Civilian Arms Sketchfab: skfb.ly/6nCp8


The Ironbelly Studio Animated FP Civilian Arms pack comes with 11 fully rigged and animated sets of hand and arms that are interchangeable. The pack includes bare male hands (with light, medium, and dark skin tones), five options for gloves- leather, leather fingerless, light latex, motorcycle, and tuxedo. There are also 5 sleeve textures- dark grey pinstripe suit, flannel shirt/ sweater/ track suit with color picker, and leather motorcycle jacket. Mix and match different sleeve and glove textures and easily customize your project.


And for those who still need that tactile touch, our AAA Animated First Person Arms Pack (https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/aaa-first-person-arms-pack) includes military fatigues and female arms.


The FP arms included are compatible with all weapons and the UE4 Starter Kit.
technicalDetails:
83 Assets
- (1) FP Arms Skeletal Rig (70 bones)
- (7) FP Arms Animations for all hands and arms (Idle, Punch, Jump, Sprint, Push Door, Grab Low, Grab High)

Hands:
- (1) Ultra High AAA Quality FP Bare Male Hands (10,600 Tris / 5,806 Verts)
-- (3) FP Bare Male Hand Skin Tones (Light, Medium, Dark) PBR Textures @ 4096x4096
- (1) Ultra High AAA Quality FP Latex Glove Hands (8,824 Tris / 4,928 Verts)
- (1) Ultra High AAA Quality FP Tuxedo Glove Hands (7,798 Tris / 4,516 Verts)
- (1) Ultra High AAA Quality FP Leather Glove Hands (8,290 Tris / 4,735 Verts)
- (1) Ultra High AAA Quality FP Fingerless Leather Glove Hands (11,484 Tris / 6,940 Verts)
- (1) Ultra High AAA Quality FP Motorcycle Glove Hands (6,446 Tris / 3,737 Verts)
-- (30) PBR Textures @ 4096x4096 for all 6 pairs (Base Color, Roughness, Normal Map, Ambient Occlusion, Metalness)

Arms:
- (1) Ultra High AAA Quality FP Motorcycle Jacket Arms (3,472 Tris / 1,940 Verts)
- (1) Ultra High AAA Quality FP Flannel Shirt Arms (3,854 Tris / 2,208 Verts)
- (1) Ultra High AAA Quality FP Sweater Arms (3,964 Tris / 2,114 Verts)
- (1) Ultra High AAA Quality FP Tracksuit Arms (2,952 Tris / 1,632 Verts)
- (1) Ultra High AAA Quality FP Pinstripe Suit Arms (5,225 Tris / 2,993 Verts)
-- (6) Color Variant PBR Textures @ 4096x4096 for Flannel Shirt, Sweater, and Tracksuit
-- (25) PBR Textures @ 4096x4096 for all 5 pairs (Base Color, Roughness, Normal Map, Ambient Occlusion, Metalness)
